name: github-diff-submodules
description: script to display submodule diffs in github.com diff views

scripts.build: npm run -s build:web && npm run -s build:userscript
scripts.build:web: npm run -s self | bookmarklet - | sed -e '1s/.*/{"bookmarklet_code": "&"}/' | cat - package.json | json --merge | mustache - index.html.mustache > index.html
scripts.build:userscript: cat package.json | json --merge | mustache - "$(npm run -s name).user.js.mustache" > "$(npm run -s name).user.js" && npm run -s self >> "$(npm run -s name).user.js"
scripts.name: node -p 'require("./package.json").name'
